katebreakingfree: I have just bought a bikini! First one in maybe 15 years. It hasn’t arrived yet but I’m nervous. My belly is very soft and wobbly and oddly shaped.
tazy_smurf: I started wearing a (super) cute bikini at the start of the year and I absolutely love the positive vibes I feel. I’m so high on these vibes that when I can clearly see/ hear people making negative comments or laughing, I smile and think about the fact that they are so concerned with a complete stranger and what they are wearing. I smile and stand tall and confident and don’t let it get to me. It actually fuels me to continue to wear it, I mean besides the fact that I love it.
miss_nadia_loves: I never wore swimmers when I was 60kg because I was so self conscious.... I’m now plus size & I totally bust out my bikini 👙 🙌🏻❤️

thisismeagankerr: I’ve become super comfortable in swimwear because at the end of the day, who is missing out if I don’t swim, or won’t go to the beach? I am. My kid is. My family is.
